entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 5 except plus 2 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5 except plus 2 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023
